Package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model

package it.polimi.ingsw.common.backend.model
Classes that implement the model of the server of the Masters of Renaissance game.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    GameFactory
    This interface represents a factory of game instances.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    Card
    Card is the abstract class for all card-like entities that share the victory points attribute.
    DevCardColor
    This class represents a development card color.
    DevCardGrid
    This class represents a grid of decks of development cards.
    DevelopmentCard
    Development cards allow the player to produce resources.
    FaithTrack
    This class represents the Faith Track of a game.
    FaithTrack.VaticanSection
    This class represents a Vatican Section in the Faith Track.
    FaithTrack.YellowTile
    This class represents a Yellow Tile in the Faith Track.
    FileGameFactory
    Factory class that builds game instances from file parameters, by acting like an adapter for parsing.
    Game
    This class represents a game of Masters of Renaissance.
    GameContext
    This class manages the states and actions of a game.
    Lobby
     
    Market
    This class represents a special container of resources that can be taken from the player.
    Player
    Class dedicated to the storage of the player's data and available operations.
    PlayerSetup
    This class represents player setup in the early game.
    SoloGame
    This class represents a single-player game of Masters of Renaissance.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    ActiveLeaderDiscardException
    Exception thrown when an active leader card is attempted to be discarded.
    CannotChooseException
    Exception thrown when a player tries to obtain bonus resources but has already done it.
    IllegalActionException
    Exception thrown when the action requested from the player is illegal in the current state of the game.
    IllegalCardDepositException
    Exception thrown when a player wants to deposit a development card on the wrong slot.
